description: A lovely warming soup to enjoy for those chilly winter nights.
name: Mushroom & Bacon Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup cream (extra to serve if desired)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a medium size pan on medium heat, add onion, garlic and bacon, cook stirring for 5 minutes or until onion has softened and bacon is cooked, but not crispy.
Add mushrooms, and cook stirring for 5 minutes or until mushrooms are tender.
Add stock, bring to the boil, then simmer for 10 minutes on low or until soup thickens slightly.
Set aside to cool for a couple of minutes.
Using a stick blender, blend soup until smooth. Stir in the cream, season if desired. Reheat on a very low heat if required.
Ladle soup into serving bowls, add extra cream on top if desired. I also add a fresh grinding of pepper as I love pepper.
